response.scenario: An organized crime syndicate orchestrates the covert transport of venomous snakes, carrying a novel pathogen, across international borders concealed in shipping containers. Meanwhile, the syndicate continues operations unchecked, further endangering global public health and biodiversity with their illicit wildlife trafficking activities.
